name: cypress-project

schema.title: Cypress Configuration
schema.description: Add cypress E2E app to test a ui library that is set up for Storybook.

name.description: Project for which to generate the cypress E2E app.
name.x-prompt: For which project do you want to generate the Cypress E2E app?

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

ciTargetName.description: The name of the devServerTarget to use for the Cypress CI configuration. Used to control if using <storybook-project>:static-storybook:ci or <storybook-project>:storybook:ci
